document_data.name: Detect Predator
document_data.mainbody: '''''Detect predator''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s in [[Ser√¥s]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to detect the presence of any aquatic predatory creature. It was able to detect both animals and sentient creatures. The detection range was {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} in all directions. The spell did not reveal the species of predator in the area.
document_data.Components: In addition to a [[verbal]] a component, the spell required a [[material component]] in the form of the caster's [[holy symbol]].
